Trigger.Name: TR_USR_SPONSORTERMINATE_BUSINESSPROCESS_DELETE_BUSINESSPROCESSINSTANCE
Trigger.Description: Used to delete the common business process records associated with this record.
Trigger.CreateTriggerSQL:
create trigger TR_USR_SPONSORTERMINATE_BUSINESSPROCESS_DELETE_BUSINESSPROCESSINSTANCE on dbo.USR_SPONSORTERMINATE_BUSINESSPROCESS after delete not for replication as begin
delete from dbo.BUSINESSPROCESSINSTANCE where BUSINESSPROCESSPARAMETERSETID in (select ID from deleted) and BUSINESSPROCESSCATALOGID = '8527734D-BD88-4326-9DCD-E491DA1523C7'; -- guid is the ID from business process spec - see SponsorTerminate.BusinessProcess.xml end
